entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain or snow. High plus 5 with temperature falling to minus 1 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to snow this afternoon. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light this morning. Wind becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High plus 5 with temperature falling to minus 1 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023
